title: I helped a government school by providing them teaching service during my holidays. I have also given them few online classes in this pandemic. Should I include this in my college application essay? - Quora

response.answer_text: Whatever pertinent information you may have that would explain your goals you should include in your essay. However be concise with your content, and yet easy to understand. Any other information or activities that you have, you can put in the comments section.
response.upvotes: Answer requested by James Singh Bista

response.answer_text: You should certainly include these things on your college application. Whether you’d put them in your essay depends on what your essay is about. If they’re relevant to the topic, fine. If not, you don’t just stick them in.
